mapper.sql: SELECT t.id,t.task_id,t.dept_id,t.project_status,t.`name`,t.quantity,t.situation,t.content_progress,t.operational_time,t.investment,t.completed_settlement,t.actual_settlement,t.intangible_assets,t.fixed_assets,t.audit_intangible_assets,t.audit_fixed_assets,t.audit_description,t.year1_settlement,t.year2_settlement,t.year3_settlement,t.year4_settlement,t.`status`,t.create_by,t.create_time,t.update_by,t.update_time,t.del_flag,tk.`name` as taskName,d.dept_name as deptName, d.parent_id as parentId, pd.dept_name as parentName FROM t_reporting_table_information_system t LEFT JOIN t_reporting_task tk on t.task_id = tk.id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on t.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept pd on d.parent_id = pd.dept_id
mapper.select: SELECT d.parent_id as parentId,pd.dept_id,pd.dept_name as deptName,SUM(quantity) as quantity,SUM(actual_settlement) as actual_settlement,SUM(intangible_assets) as intangible_assets,SUM(fixed_assets) as fixed_assets FROM `t_reporting_table_information_system` t LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on t.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept pd on d.parent_id = pd.dept_id where t.task_id = #{taskId} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.dept_id in (SELECT dept_id from t_budget_item_dept where item_id = 8) and t.status != 1 and t.status != 4 and (t.status = 3 or t.status = 5) GROUP BY d.parent_id

SELECT d.parent_id as parentId,pd.dept_id,pd.dept_name as deptName,SUM(quantity) as quantity,SUM(actual_settlement) as actual_settlement,SUM(intangible_assets) as intangible_assets,SUM(fixed_assets) as fixed_assets, SUM(CASE WHEN t.status = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS reportNumber FROM `t_reporting_table_information_system` t LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on t.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept pd on d.parent_id = pd.dept_id where t.task_id = #{taskId} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.dept_id in (SELECT dept_id from t_budget_item_dept where item_id = 8) and t.status != 1 and t.status != 4 GROUP BY d.parent_id
